title: A certain sum at compound interest amounts to Rs. 5750 in 2 years and Rs 8625 in 3 years. What is the rate percent per annum? - Quora

response.answer_text: USE FORMULA A = P ( 1 + r/100) ^n A = amount , P = principal , r = rate , n = no of years 8625 = 5750 ( 1+ r/100) ^1 8625 /5750 = 1 + r/100 = 1.5 r = 50% ANSWER
